title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our growing team. You'll be responsible for building scalable, performant web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern frontend technologies. Work with an amazing team on products that millions of users depend on.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript
Strong understanding of CSS, HTML, and responsive design
Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Zustand)
Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)

title: Product Manager
description: Join our product team to lead the development of innovative financial technology products. You'll work closely with engineering, design, and business teams to define product strategy and execute on the roadmap.
requirements: Experience in fintech or financial services

title: UX Designer
description: We're seeking a talented UX Designer to create intuitive and delightful user experiences. You'll work on a variety of client projects, from mobile apps to web platforms, conducting user research and designing user flows.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Experience with user research and usability testing

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our research team to work on cutting-edge machine learning projects. You'll develop models, analyze large datasets, and collaborate with engineers to deploy ML solutions at scale.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in data science or machine learning
Experience with deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
PhD or Master's in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We're looking for a DevOps Engineer to help scale our cloud infrastructure. You'll work on CI/CD pipelines, container orchestration, and monitoring systems to ensure high availability and performance.
requirements: 4+ years of DevOps or SRE experience
Strong knowledge of AWS, GCP, or Azure
Proficiency in infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)

title: Backend Engineer
description: Join our backend engineering team to build scalable APIs and microservices. You'll work with Node.js, Python, or Go to develop systems that handle millions of requests daily.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js, Python, or Go

title: Mobile Developer (iOS/Android)
description: We're seeking a Mobile Developer to build native iOS and Android applications. You'll work on features that millions of users interact with daily, focusing on performance and user experience.
requirements: Experience with React Native is a plus
Understanding of mobile UI/UX best practices

title: Security Engineer
description: Join our security team to protect our systems and user data. You'll conduct security audits, implement security best practices, and respond to security incidents.
requirements: Knowledge of penetration testing and vulnerability assessment

title: QA Engineer
description: We're looking for a QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our software products. You'll write and maintain automated tests, conduct manual testing, and work closely with developers to identify and fix bugs.
requirements: Experience with test automation frameworks (Selenium, Cypress)
Attention to detail and analytical thinking

title: Engineering Manager
description: Lead a team of talented engineers in building innovative products. You'll manage team performance, drive technical decisions, and help engineers grow in their careers.
requirements: 7+ years of engineering experience with 3+ years in leadership

title: Design Lead
description: Lead our design team in creating beautiful and functional user experiences. You'll establish design processes, mentor designers, and collaborate with product and engineering teams.
requirements: 6+ years of design experience with leadership experience
Strong portfolio of product design work

title: UX Researcher
description: Conduct user research to inform product design decisions. You'll plan and execute user studies, analyze findings, and present insights to product and design teams.
requirements: Degree in HCI, Psychology, or related field

title: Marketing Director
description: Lead our marketing team to drive brand awareness and customer acquisition. You'll develop marketing strategy, manage campaigns, and work with cross-functional teams to achieve business goals.
requirements: 8+ years of marketing experience with leadership experience

title: Technical Writer
description: Create clear and comprehensive documentation for developers. You'll write API docs, tutorials, and guides that help developers use our tools effectively.
requirements: Ability to explain complex concepts clearly

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build full-stack web applications for a variety of clients. You'll work with React, Node.js, and modern web technologies to create engaging digital experiences.
requirements: Ability to work on multiple projects
